options: ['Two basketballs and six volleyballs.', 'Eight basketballs and six volleyballs.', 'Six basketballs and six volleyballs.', 'Eight basketballs and eight volleyballs.']
article: I have seven bags. Three bags are big, and the other four bags are small. I have some basketballs and volleyballs. I put two volleyballs in each small bag. And I put two basketballs and two volleyballs in each big bag. The number of the volleyballs is my age.
